transfer.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from the caller to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from one address to another, using the allowance mechanism.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given owner's address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

approve.description: Approves the spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified address.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

owner.description: Returns the address of the contract's owner.

paused.description: Returns whether the contract is currently paused.

rescueToken.description: Rescues tokens from the contract and sends them to a specified beneficiary.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens in circulation.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.
